==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|gmh|de}} {{m|gmh|schicken||to outfit oneself, fit in, arrange appropriately}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*skikkijaną||to order, send}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|de}} {{m|ine-pro|*skeg-||to jump, spring}}; representing the causative of {{etyl|gmh|de}} {{m|gmh|geschehen|geschehen, geschēn|to happen, rush}} from {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|giskehan||to happen}} from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*skehaną||to run, move quickly}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|de}} {{m|ine-pro|*skek-||to run, jump, spring}}. Akin to {{cog|enm|skekken||to send forth}}, {{cog|ang|scēon||to happen}}, ''schie-'' in {{cog|nl|schielijk||hasty}}. More at {{m|en|chic}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʃɪkŋ̩/|/ˈʃɪkən/}} * {{audio|de|De-schicken.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-schicken.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{rhymes|de|ɪkŋ̩}} * {{homophone|de|Chicken}} {{qualifier|according to one pronunciation of this word}} * {{hyph|de|schi|cken|caption=Hyphenation {{w|German orthography reform of 1996|1996}}}}, {{hyph|de|schik|ken|caption=pre-{{w|German orthography reform of 1996|1996}}}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|schickt|schickte|geschickt}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[send]] # {{lb|de|reflexive}} to [[hurry]] (rare) # {{lb|de|reflexive}} to be decent, to be appropriate ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|schick|geschickt|h}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|to send}} {{l|de|senden}}, {{l|de|versenden}}, {{l|de|verschicken}} * {{sense|to be decent, to be appropriate}} {{l|de|benehmen|sich benehmen}} ====Antonyms==== * {{sense|to send}} {{l|de|empfangen}}, {{l|de|erhalten}}, {{l|de|bekommen}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|abschicken}} * {{l|de|anschicken}} * {{l|de|hinschicken}} * {{l|de|nachschicken}} * {{l|de|verschicken}} * {{l|de|vorschicken}} * {{l|de|zurückschicken}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:DWDS}} * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Middle Dutch== ===Etymology=== {{unk|dum}}. ===Verb=== {{dum-verb}} # to [[arrange]], to [[carry out]], to get [[done]] # to [[create]], to bring to [[life]] # to [[direct]] # to [[determine]], to [[assign]] # {{lb|dum|late}} to [[send]], to [[delegate]] ====Inflection==== {{rfinfl|dum|verb}}{{cln|dum|weak verbs}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|nl|schikken}} * {{desc|li|sjikke}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:MNW|49601}}
